title: [1.12.2] Kettle —— 基于 PaperSpigot & Forge 的服务端 开源项目 (搬运非作者
author: TUCAOEVER
txt_content:
本帖最后由 吐槽管理 于 2019-8-6 21:48 编辑 

! Kettle is still very raw and you may encounter issues in using it with your server. You have been warned!! Kettle 现在还处于非常原始的阶段 你可能会在使用的过程中随时发现问题 请谨慎考虑







68747470733a2f2f692e696d6775722e636f6d2f676b6d544b76522e706e67.png (17.44 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-8-6 21:34 上传







Kettle > Contigo > Thermos > KCauldron > Cauldron > MCPC+


Kettle was initially concieved as a fork of Contigo, but after a few iterations got rid of Contigo's dependencies and can no longer be concidered it's fork, but a standalone hybrid server.
Kettle 最初被认为是 Contigo 的分支, 但是在几个版本的更迭后, Kettle 摆脱了 Contigo 的依赖关系, 并成为一个独立的服务端.
Kettle is dependent on custom Forge and Paper builds, meaning it can run both Craftbukkit/spigot-based plugins and forge-based mods.
Kettle 依赖于自定义 Forge 以及 PaperSpigot 构建, 这意味着它将兼容所有依赖于 CraftBukkit 以及 Spigot 的插件 以及独立 MOD
We hope to eliminate all issues with craftbukkit forge servers. In the end, we envision a seamless, low lag Kettle experience with support for new 1.12+ versions of Minecraft.
我们希望能消除所有关于 Kettle 的服务端问题. 在最后, 我们希望 Kettle 能给所有人带来 无缝连接, 低性能消耗 的服务端体验

For Windows:
@ECHO OFF
Java -Xms128M -Dfile.encoding=CP866 -XX:+AggressiveOpts -verbose:gc -Xloggc:gc.log -d64 -jar kettle.jar
@pause

For Linux:
cd /home/<your kettle dir>rm eula.txt
echo eula=true>eula.txt
screen -dmS kettle java -Xms 512M -Xmx2G -server -jar kettle.jar

开源地址 : https://github.com/KettleFoundation/Kettle
